position.marginalia_text: Historici, et Jurisconsulti maximè pragmatici. Justinus, et Neander: cu[m[ Plutarchi vitis; et
Gandini Stratagematis: quasi instar totius Gra[e]cia[e].

/ Theise boyes dare say to your face: Alas, it cannot be in you, that is in them. They ar younger, bigger, stronger, quicker, or able to endure Labour, ritcher, in higher office. What predominant, or Equipollent for all these? Noman, so continent, hardie, swift, daily daily exercised, how erlie refined, as he should be.
{ Nihil in Rom. Historia magis pragmaticum, quàm Mithridatis regis. Epistola, et Oratio illa apud Salustiu[m]: ha[e]c apud Justinum, Libro 38.
{ Mihi egregiè conducunt Juliani Ca[e]sares: Guiccardini principes quasi depicti: Quinctus pde petitione Consulatus: Marcus de prouincia administranda:
Sallustius de Rep. ordinana. Plutarchi Politica: Xenophontis Hierone.
Multi egregij, admirabiles, quicquid volunt: sed mihi opus est ad unguem Eutropius, et Suetonius: Ca[e]sar, et Tacitus. Aut da Magistros. Justinianum, Bartholu[m], Durandu[m]; et
Necessaria etiam ad unguem Althusij ars Juris propter memoriam: Hopperi ciuilis ratio propter illuminatu[m] discursum: Vigelij repertorium, et ius controuersum propter expeditam, certamq[ue] Praxin:
